txt.en:
'Ah! Perhaps you can be of aid!

'Have you seen these horrific nameless creatures? They have especially infested an area on the lake's eastern edge. I beseech you, [placeholder], go there and rid us of some of these revolting things! 

'Have you realized that some of them don't even have heads? Vile, to be sure!'
'You have greatly lightened my mind, [placeholder]. Now perhaps I can just put the whole business out....\n\n'What! You saw dwarf-corpses there? And they were gnawed upon? Ai-oi!'
'Oh, please don't talk to me until you can assure me those revolting things are no longer here to torment my imagination!'
Nökkvi fears the strange, nameless horrors he has seen in the Foundations of Stone.
Defeated Nameless in the Foundations of Stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Nameless in the Foundations of Stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Nameless can be found throughout the Foundations of Stone, especially along the lake's eastern edge.\n\nNökkvi wishes you to dispose of the nameless horrors that have been terrifying him
Talk to Nökkvi at the Shadowed Refuge
Nökkvi is at the Shadowed Refuge in the Foundations of Stone.\n\nYou should return to Nökkvi and assure him that you have slain the nameless beasts.
